title: tiruvaDi darishanam
sahitya:
tiruvaDi darishanam tEDi vandEn tirupati vAzh shrI venkaTaramaNA


anupallavi

  muruval pUtta mukhamum karuNai vizhiyum aravaNi tulangum iru bhujangaLum
 Azhi valam puri taritta karangaLum tiruvurai mArbum dInar tamaik-kAkkum


caraNam    bhUvamar ayanum haranum pugazhndiDa mEvi Ezhumalai mEl kOvil koNDAi
 gOvindA enak-kUvi azhaippOrkkuk-kuraivinri aruL shErkkum guNakkunrE enrum
 sura bhUsurar paNi tirumAlE tIrA vinai tIrttiDum emperumAnE un
